description: Adds a new comment to the specified document version.

parameters.name: VersionId
parameters.description: The ID of the document version.

nested_items.name: CommentId
nested_items.description: The ID of the comment.

nested_items.name: ParentId
nested_items.description: The ID of the parent comment.

nested_items.name: ThreadId
nested_items.description: The ID of the root comment in the thread.

nested_items.name: Text
nested_items.description: The text of the comment.

nested_items.name: Contributor
nested_items.description: The details of the user who made the comment.

nested_items.name: Id
nested_items.description: The ID of the user.

nested_items.name: Username
nested_items.description: The login name of the user.

nested_items.name: EmailAddress
nested_items.description: The email address of the user.

nested_items.name: GivenName
nested_items.description: The given name of the user.

nested_items.name: Surname
nested_items.description: The surname of the user.

nested_items.name: OrganizationId
nested_items.description: The ID of the organization.

nested_items.name: RootFolderId
nested_items.description: The ID of the root folder.

nested_items.name: RecycleBinFolderId
nested_items.description: The ID of the recycle bin folder.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The status of the user.

nested_items.name: Type
nested_items.description: The type of user.

nested_items.name: CreatedTimestamp
nested_items.description: The time when the user was created.

nested_items.name: ModifiedTimestamp
nested_items.description: The time when the user was modified.

nested_items.name: TimeZoneId
nested_items.description: The time zone ID of the user.

nested_items.name: Locale
nested_items.description: The locale of the user.

nested_items.name: StorageUtilizedInBytes
nested_items.description: The amount of storage used, in bytes.

nested_items.name: StorageRule
nested_items.description: The storage for a user.

nested_items.name: StorageAllocatedInBytes
nested_items.description: The amount of storage allocated, in bytes.

nested_items.name: StorageType
nested_items.description: The type of storage.

nested_items.name: CreatedTimestamp
nested_items.description: The time that the comment was created.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The status of the comment.

nested_items.name: Visibility
nested_items.description: The visibility of the comment. Options are either PRIVATE, where the comment is visible only to the comment author and document owner and co-owners, or PUBLIC, where the comment is visible to document owners, co-owners, and contributors.

nested_items.name: RecipientId
nested_items.description: If the comment is a reply to another user's comment, this field contains the user ID of the user being replied to.
